fraudPlaybook.title: Block Channels
fraudPlaybook.action: Call 1800111109 or SMS "BLOCK <Last 4 digits of card>" to 567676. Use YONO app to block netbanking.

fraudPlaybook.title: Report to Cybercrime
fraudPlaybook.action: Call 1930 immediately or visit cybercrime.gov.in to register a complaint.

fraudPlaybook.title: Notify SBI Branch
fraudPlaybook.action: Email customercare@sbi.co.in and visit your branch within 3 working days for zero liability protection.

name: HDFC Bank
about: India's largest private sector bank by assets, offering specialized financial products and services.

verifiedLinks.label: HDFC Bank Netbanking
verifiedLinks.description: Official internet banking portal or information page.

fraudPlaybook.title: Immediate Block
fraudPlaybook.action: Call 18002586161 immediately or use NetBanking/Mobile App to block all cards and UPI.

fraudPlaybook.title: Report to Cybercrime
fraudPlaybook.action: Call 1930 or report on cybercrime.gov.in. Keep transaction ID and amount details ready.

fraudPlaybook.title: Formal Dispute
fraudPlaybook.action: Submit a formal dispute letter at your HDFC branch or via the Dispute Cell on the HDFC website within 3 days.

name: ICICI Bank
about: One of India's leading private sector banks offering a wide range of banking products and financial services.

verifiedLinks.label: ICICI Bank Netbanking
verifiedLinks.description: Official internet banking portal or information page.

fraudPlaybook.title: Freeze Account
fraudPlaybook.action: Call 18001080 and select option to report unauthorized transaction or use iMobile app to freeze.

fraudPlaybook.title: Cybercrime Portal
fraudPlaybook.action: Register a complaint on cybercrime.gov.in or call 1930 immediately.

fraudPlaybook.title: Nodal Escalation
fraudPlaybook.action: If not resolved within 3 days, email pno@icicibank.com with the reference number.
